opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Peralta-Flores, AKA Peralta, AKA Salgado v. United States

opinion:
543 U.S. 1116

PERALTA-FLORES, AKA PERALTA, AKA SALGADO
v.
UNITED STATES.

No. 04-7848.

Supreme Court of United States.

January 24, 2005.

1

C. A. 9th Cir. Reported below: 109 Fed. Appx. 962; and Motions of petitioners for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Certiorari granted, judgments vacated, and cases remanded for further consideration in light of United States v. Booker, ante, p. 220.
